situation.title: Post Office
situation.meta_description: The post offices are open, but the opening hours are limited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The post offices are open, but the opening hours are limited. You can find the opening hours at. It is also still possible to use the Czech POINT service.

You can go to the post office, the ban on free movement (aside from 21:00-4:59) does not apply to post office visits. Wear your mask and social distance for the whole time. You can enter in a group of max. 2 people (not including children under 15). Wear your mask even if you are receiving a package delivered to your home.

Before entering the post office and receiving the package, disinfect your hands. You can open the delivered package outside to minimize the risk of infection.

The post is still delivering letters and packages to your home. If you aren't at home at the time, the package will be left in a post office, where you can go to pick it up. For maximum safety of yourself and the deliverers, you can use the option of delivery via code.

If you have a package kept at the post office that can be picked up using an identification code, that package will be given to a person who knows the identification code and the name and address of the addressee or the code of consignment. This can only be done with packages without delivery directly to the addressee.

questions_answers.question: Are post offices open?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but the opening hours may be limited.

questions_answers.question: What should I do while in quarantine or self-isolation and I have a package at the post office to pick up?
questions_answers.value: Inform the specific post office. They will either deliver the package to your postbox or keep it in the post office, then you can pick up the package in following 30 days. Please be aware that during the state of emergency special rules for those in quarantine or isolation apply.

questions_answers.question: Is the Czech POINT service operating in the state of emergency?
Can I go to the post office if I'm not in quarantine or self-isolation?
Can the post leave a package at my doorstep if I'm in quarantine or isolation?
questions_answers.value: Yes, you can use contactless delivery.

questions_answers.question: Does the post deliver packages to my home address?
questions_answers.value: Yes, if receiving a package, wear a mask please.
